amendment.description: Amendments add language which states that attention should be paid to providing health care and basic education to children and children who are orphans in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: Amendments numbered 3 and 4 printed in the Congressional Record and offered en bloc to state that attention should be paid to providing health care and basic education to children and children who are orphans in Afghanistan.
